action.text: SA 1904 fell when the motion to concur in the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 195 with an amendment (SA 1903) tabled.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 1904 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 1903. (consideration: CR S305; text: CR S305) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1904 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 1903.
